title: It was the remains of the United States. The soldiers are drowning in landfills?
subtitle: A 2011 report on the burned partial remains of 274 soldiers thrown into landfills was reappeared several years later.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The remains of more than 250 soldiers were dumped in landfills between 2004 and 2008, a fact that was ignored by the main media.
